photos.title: Photos
photos.description:
@[100064662821151:2048:New Jersey Board of Public Utilities] Provided an update on the recent hearing regarding Optimum! A lot of interesting background included on the history of the merger between @[1859850124320787:274:Altice USA] and @[389868724395273:274:Optimum] .

Testimonies from mayors and townships across New Jersey were included in this summary.

NJ Division of Rate Counsel has requested an in-depth investigation into whether AlticeUSA is meeting their regulatory requirements as set forth in the initial merger filings.

https://twitter.com/PWAYNJ/status/1374736917988773889

https://cms9.revize.com/revize/piscatawaynj/Rate%20Counsel%20comments%2003.23.21.pdf

#cableinternet #cable #internet #broadband #broadbandforall #internetforall #docsis

photos.title: Photos
photos.description:
Our survey responses have slowed down drastically, dropping from 10-12/day to only a handful for the past week

Please, if you are reading this and haven't finished our survey, we are asking for you help. We hope to finish the month with 300 responses!

https://tscfis.org/optimum-survey

If you've already completed the survey, we ask that you please share this post on your social media or ask your family/friends to complete.

Even if each of our 350 followers only had one person complete the survey, our responses would double overnight!

photos.title: Photos
photos.description:
This chart shows the growth of survey responses over time.

Dark Red Line = Cumulative Total
Faded Red Line = Average trend
Blue bars = Daily response volume
Yellow Line = Daily responses over a 7-day average

Open letter to @[100064662821151:2048:New Jersey Board of Public Utilities], regarding the investigation requested by Division of Rate Counsel.

It's been 3 weeks since the results of the public hearing were released. Why have we not heard anything further? Please email your representatives and send your own email to NJBPU. 

You can use ours as a template. Text of letter in post comment below.

Hearing Results: https://tscfis.org/2021/03/24/results-of-njbpu-public-hearing-released/

#NewJersey #NJ

photos.title: Photos
photos.description:
In case you haven't already noticed, we've enabled a new system that automatically posts replies to our survey.
We hope this will help our followers see their comments given a boost in reach, so others can understand the issues.
These will be posted on our Twitter as well. https://twitter.com/tri_fair
Let us know what you think about this. We've made sure to exclude any identifying information such as Email Address.
If you'd like to see your comments posted here to be shared, you'll need to complete our survey. 
https://tscfis.org/optimum-survey/

photos.title: Photos
photos.description:
We're so close to 400 responses to our Optimum/Altice Consumer feedback survey! Currently averaging ~100/month. At the current rate, we should be able to reach 1,000 before the end of the year. 

Help us out and get us to 400 today! Complete our survey, leave a review and help build the largest dataset of user feedback against Optimum. If interested, we'll also get you in touch with our friends @fairshake to open a claim against Altice.

https://tscfis.org/isp-satisfaction-surveys/

#canceloptimum #alticeiscancelled #optimumiscancelled #internetforall #broadbandcompetition #fairinternet

photos.title: Photos
photos.description:
We've re-branded!

Tri-State Coalition for Fair Internet Service is now "Fair Internet Coalition".

We've decided to make this change for a few reasons.

1. Broader market appeal to a wider area.
2. Less wordy, easy to share.
3. More convenient for our legal NonProfit Status

Over time, you'll start seeing "Fair Internet coalition" pop up more.

Thanks as always for your support!

photos.title: Photos
photos.description:
https://tscfis.wordpress.com/isp-satisfaction-surveys/optimum-survey/

This is a CALL TO ACTION. WE NEED YOUR HELP!

We are meeting with the NY AG's office for an initial meeting NEXT THURSDAY 5/27!

Our most important resource has been the stories that YOU shared on our survey. We're currently at ~420 and would like to see if we can round that out to 500 before Thursday.

PLEASE complete the survey below! If everyone in this group has had enough with Optimum, this is YOUR CHANCE to make your voice heard!

We need this data so we can effectively show exactly how badly consumers have been treated by Optimum/Altice. 

If you've already completed the survey, we ask that you share the link on your Facebook profile or directly with a friend/family member.

We can do this TOGETHER!
#digitaldivide #BroadbandForAll #INTERNET #CABLE #bigtelecom #freetheinternet

photos.title: Photos
photos.description:
We've seen many people post today about the TV Guide and AlticeOne app outage. As expected, Optimum has been slow to resolve these issues.

We feel this is an important time to remind everyone about the benefits of Streaming TV. You would NEVER have this issue on YouTubeTV, Hulu Live or Fubo TV. Maybe buffering if there was an internet issue, but never information missing.

Same goes for DVR. You'd never lose your recordings since it's all in the cloud and could be watched on any device. 

Please consider dropping Optimum TV and switching to LiveTV Streaming. It's now more affordable and easier to use than ever. Message or email us if you have questions about #cordcutting.

Picture credit @megplatt86 on Twitter.

photos.title: Photos
photos.description:
This year, we here at FIC are thankful for our followers that help give a voice for internet fairness, and all efforts towards broadband competition.

Wishing all our followers a safe and Happy Thanksgiving!

photos.title: Photos
photos.description:
Reminder to our NY followers.

PLEASE Contact Governor Kathy Hochul and ask her to sign Senate Bill S.7028 in support of #Broadband competition in the state. 

This bill would make it much more affordable for new providers to enter the market.

Details and instructions are in the link below. Make your voice heard!

https://tscfis.wordpress.com/2021/12/09/call-to-action-broadband-access-bill-awaiting-gov-hochul-signature/

photos.title: Photos
photos.description:
Looks like they're listening to us! The bill we asked you to email Governor Kathy Hochul about? We just got word that it was called up to her office!

Now all we have to wait for is her signature! This is how powerful the voice of the people can be!

https://www.nysenate.gov/legislation/bills/2021/A2396/amendment/A

Let's all give John a big Thank you!

photos.title: Photos
photos.description:
We've heard reports that Optimum is considering dropping WPIX 11 from their listings.  There is a website to petition Optimum to keep this channel https://www.keeppix11.com/.

Something we'd like to add, PIX11 is already available on streaming services like @YouTubeTV. See the attached image below.

If you were already planning on cancelling OptimumTV, Cutting the cord and switching to streaming; this is just another reason to do so! You'll likely save money as well.

photos.description:
On our April 25th General Meeting, we'll be having a guest speaker in attendance.

None other than Brad Ickes, CEO and President of OCG Communications! His company is bringing Fiber service to residents across Long Island, NY.

Tune in live and post any questions you may have! 

As always, we'll be livestreaming on YouTube for all our followers. Those who donate to us on Patreon get access to the meeting dial-in information.

Subscribe on YouTube so you never miss an update!
https://youtu.be/5vM2vTKXcSo

photos.title: Photos
photos.description:
Optimum updated their Terms of Service, Paragraph on Independent Arbitration. changes taking effect July 20th. Have you read the ToS? 

https://www.optimum.com/terms-of-service/business.amended#para26

It's important to be informed on what you sign up for!

"Any and all disputes ... shall be resolved by binding arbitration on an individual basis."

"Resolving Your dispute with Optimum through arbitration means You will have a fair hearing before a neutral arbitrator instead of in a court before a judge or jury. YOU AGREE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THIS AGREEMENT, YOU AND OPTIMUM EACH WAIVE THE RIGHT TO A TRIAL BY JURY AND THE RIGHT TO PARTICIPATE IN A CLASS, REPRESENTATIVE, OR PRIVATE ATTORNEY GENERAL ACTION."
